patthana23.54:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.54:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.54:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
